title: e-Delphi Workshop for Developing Online Peer Observation Criteria

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic online education concepts, foundational peer assessment experience
context.additional_context: VR-based simulation environment aimed at enhancing peer observation criteria development capabilities, operating in a smartphone-centric limited technology environment

learning_goals: Learners can derive five or more online learning observation items using the e-Delphi technique.
Learners can design a peer observation process in a VR simulation environment with three or more stages.
Learners can create a 13-category observation checklist executable in a smartphone-based environment.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
